verbs.description: [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: no fan of the free press] . Kim Jong Un is really no fan of the free press . So guess what happened at their summit ? Yup , press access was extremely limited . A press pool of about half the usual size got a few minutes to see Trump and ...
